{{小写标题}}

*「'''rise'''」是TV动画《[[攻壳机动队|攻壳机动队S.A.C. 2nd GIG]]》的OP，由ORIGA演唱。

== 歌曲 ==
{{BilibiliVideo|id=2444748|page=1}}

== 歌詞 ==

|original=
I'm a soldier, значит я 
И ответчик и судья 
Я стою на двух концах огня 
Огибая виражи, обгоняя смерть и жизнь 
Я бегу сразиться с тенью лжи 

Сколько б нитей не плёл обман

Save your tears 
for the day 
when our pain is far behind 
on your feet 
come with me 
we are soldiers stand or die 

Save your fears 
take your place 
save them for the judgement day 
fast and free 
follow me 
time to make the sacrifice 
we rise or fall

in this waking hell I am 
witnessing more than I can compute 

pray myself we don't forget 
lies, betrayed and the oppressed

people facing the fire together

Save your tears 
for the day 
when our pain is far behind 
on your feet 
come with me 
we are soldiers stand or die
